column3: (c) Neither Accurate Nor Inaccurate. As a shy person, I would say that I don't necessarily feel blue all the time, but I also don't feel particularly happy or energetic most of the time. I would say that my mood is more neutral than anything else.

(c) Neither Accurate Nor Inaccurate. As a shy person, I tend to avoid starting conversations and prefer to observe and listen before contributing to a discussion. While I may not always initiate conversations, I do not necessarily feel uncomfortable or incapable of doing so.

While I may try to prepare myself in some ways (such as practicing what to say or wearing clothes that make me feel more confident), I don't always feel fully prepared for every situation.
